text: I have this hooked to a Sears Shop Wet/Dry Vacuum.  As others have noted, the attachment size is a little "non-standard", probably due to the fact that the hose fits over the tools instead of sliding in them.  Nonetheless, the hose and swivel are easy to use and the material makes for very efficient pickup.  I also like the claw and crevice nozzle.  They are a bit small for small spaces in my small car, but they are great for going over floors, seats, and jobsite pickup.  Definitely recommended over the stock hose that comes with most shop & wet/dry vacs.

Sturdy with an adjustable mouth and blade tilt.Understand you will need to prep this before use. The sole is not precision ground but machine rough, so you will need a granite block and sandpaper or a set of flat block diamond hones. Once you have your sole (and sides) honed and flat you will need to sharpen the blade. There are several jigs and sharpening tools to assist in this. After all is done apply an anti-rust agent such as wood wax or Boeshield.Once prep'd this is a great plane.

I picked this game up at a store because it was on sale.  Got home and read reviews...almost returned it.  Glad I didn't because it actually works very well for my kids.  My daughter (4) and son (2 1/2) both love it and can always make a "basket" within about 4 tries.  My kids were actually better at it than my husband and myself!  Granted, we have to center the doggy for them so they're lined up to flip the ants, but I don't mind that.  Definitely wasn't too difficult for them.

I purchased this game to be used during a trip with my granddaughters ages 6 and 8.  They loved the game so much that one of them asked that I purchase another one just for them for their birthday.  It is a great tool to assist them in broadening their vocabulary and spelling skills while enjoying the competition of a game. It is easy to play and understand.  Melissa and Doug have designed a visibly appealing and durable product with all parts attached to the one board eliminating the chance of losing pieces.

If you have not already noticed, Diablo is easily located within Dungeons and Dragons. This is actually a benefit for Diablo, since it has very little story going on. This RPG/action hybrid is nice and it's multiplayer community is huge. Too bad there are millions of cheaters. Just be legit and everyone else will catch on. The game offers lots of fun. Not many complaints though. They are really your choice as to if they're bad or good. Get the game if you want. Not a wasted "money".

Dino Crisis is a great game -- lots of excitement, suspense, and action.  It doesn't fail there.  I beat it in four days (seven hours playing time), though, so definitely rent it first.Some of the voice acting is weak,  but it's not the worst out there.  The story will keep you interested, as  will the battles with the enemy dinosaurs.  An added plus is the decisions  you must make at key points in the story, but even this (and the different  costumes) isn't enough to give the game the replay value it needs to make  it a 5-star game.

I have linked this to a Sears Shop Wet/Dry Vacuum. As pointed out by others, the attachment size is a little unconventional, likely because the hose fits over the tools rather than inserting into them. Nevertheless, the hose and swivel are simple to use and the material used ensures highly efficient pickup. Additionally, I appreciate the claw and crevice nozzle, which although a bit small for compact spaces in my small car, work excellently for cleaning floors, seats, and picking up debris at job sites. I definitely recommend this over the standard hose that comes with most shop & wet/dry vacs.

Prior to utilization, make sure to prepare this sturdy tool with an adjustable mouth and blade tilt. The sole may not be precisely ground but rather machine rough, requiring a granite block and sandpaper or a set of flat block diamond hones. Once the sole (and sides) are honed and flat, proceed to sharpen the blade. Various jigs and sharpening tools are available to aid in this process. Finally, apply an anti-rust agent like wood wax or Boeshield. This well-prepared plane is truly exceptional.

It is essential to prepare this robust plane, equipped with an adjustable mouth and blade tilt, before you can utilize it. Although the sole is not perfectly ground and has a rough machine finish, you can rectify this by using a granite block and sandpaper, or a set of flat block diamond hones. Once you have honed and flattened the sole (including the sides), proceed to sharpen the blade using various jigs and sharpening tools as needed. To protect against rust, it is advisable to apply an anti-rust agent such as wood wax or Boeshield. Once adequately prepared, this plane will function excellently.

Before using this durable plane, which features an adjustable mouth and blade tilt, it is crucial to perform some preparations. The sole, although not precisely ground, can be made smoother by utilizing a granite block and either sandpaper or a set of flat block diamond hones. After honing and flattening the sole (including the sides), the next step is to sharpen the blade. There are several jigs and sharpening tools available to assist you with this task. Once all the necessary steps are completed, apply an anti-rust agent such as wood wax or Boeshield. Once properly prepped, this plane proves to be excellent.

In order to utilize this reliable plane, which comes with an adjustable mouth and blade tilt, it is necessary to undertake certain preparations. I bought this game from a store because it was discounted. When I read reviews at home, I almost decided to return it. However, I'm glad I didn't because it works really well for my kids. Both my 4-year-old daughter and 2 1/2-year-old son love it and can consistently make a "basket" within four tries. Surprisingly, my kids are actually better at it than my husband and me. We do have to position the doggy for them to line up the ants for flipping, but that doesn't bother me. It was definitely not too challenging for them.

On sale at a store, I purchased this game. After reading reviews at home, I almost returned it. Fortunately, I'm pleased that I didn't because it is actually very suitable for my kids. They, both my 4-year-old daughter and 2 1/2-year-old son, enjoy it and are consistently successful in making a "basket" within around four attempts. Astonishingly, my kids outperform my husband and me in this game. It is true that we have to align the doggy for them to flip the ants accurately, but I have no issue with that. It was definitely not too challenging for them.

During a trip with my granddaughters, aged 6 and 8, I bought this game. They enjoyed it so much that one of them requested me to buy another one just for their birthday. It serves as a fantastic aid in enhancing their vocabulary and spelling skills while offering an enjoyable gaming experience. The game's simplicity and clear instructions make it easy to play and comprehend. Additionally, Melissa and Doug have created a visually appealing and long-lasting product, with all the pieces securely attached to the board, eliminating the possibility of losing any parts.

Remarkably, Melissa and Doug have created a visually captivating and durable product that has all its components securely attached to the game board, negating any chances of losing pieces.

Diablo can be easily found within the world of Dungeons and Dragons, a fact that may have escaped your notice. However, this is actually advantageous for Diablo due to its minimal storyline. This RPG/action hybrid is highly enjoyable, with a vast multiplayer community. Unfortunately, the presence of numerous cheaters is a downside, but remaining legitimate will garner the attention of others. With plenty of fun to offer, there are few complaints about the game, although it ultimately depends on your own preferences whether they are positive or negative. Feel free to acquire the game without worrying about wasting your "money".

In case you haven't realized, Diablo is conveniently situated within Dungeons and Dragons. Interestingly, this works in favor of Diablo since it lacks a complex storyline. This enjoyable RPG/action hybrid has a massive multiplayer community. It's a shame that there are countless cheaters, but staying honest will earn you recognition. The game provides ample amounts of fun and receives minimal complaints, which are subjective and based on personal preference. If you desire, go ahead and get the game without fear of it being a waste of "money".

If you haven't already noticed, Diablo can be easily found within the realm of Dungeons and Dragons. This is actually a benefit for Diablo, as it doesn't rely heavily on storytelling. This engaging mix of RPG and action boasts a thriving multiplayer community. The downside is the presence of numerous cheaters, but by playing fair, you'll gain appreciation from others. The game offers abundant fun with very few complaints, although whether they are negative or positive largely depends on individual tastes. If you're interested, acquiring the game won't be a futile expenditure of "money".

Dino Crisis is an excellent game as it provides immense excitement, suspense, and action. It certainly does not disappoint. I managed to complete it within four days, playing for a total of seven hours, so I would suggest renting it before purchasing.

With its abundance of excitement, suspense, and action, Dino Crisis proves to be a fantastic game. While I managed to finish it within four days (seven hours of gameplay), I would advise trying it out on rent first. Some of the voice acting is subpar, but it is not the worst you will encounter. The captivating story and thrilling battles with enemy dinosaurs will definitely keep you engaged. The game also offers the additional thrill of making important decisions at crucial points in the storyline and the option to choose different costumes. However, these aspects alone do not provide the game with the replay value necessary to make it a 5-star game.

Dino Crisis is an outstanding game filled with excitement, suspense, and action. It never fails to deliver on those fronts. Although I was able to complete it in just four days, with a playing time of seven hours, I would recommend renting it first. While some of the voice acting is weak, it doesn't reach the level of being the worst. The captivating story will ensure your interest remains intact, as will the intense battles with the enemy dinosaurs. An added advantage is the inclusion of decision-making at crucial points in the plot, as well as the availability of different costumes. However, even with these features, the game fails to provide the necessary replay value to earn it a 5-star rating.

Dino Crisis is an exceptional game, offering an abundance of excitement, suspense, and action. It undoubtedly lives up to its reputation. Despite completing the game within four days, with just seven hours of gameplay, I suggest giving it a try on rent before purchasing. While the voice acting may have some weak moments, it is by no means the worst. The gripping story and thrilling battles against the enemy dinosaurs will keep you hooked. Additionally, the inclusion of decision-making opportunities at critical points in the narrative, as well as the variety of costumes, adds to the game's appeal. However, even with these impressive elements, the game lacks the necessary replay value to achieve a perfect 5-star rating.

Dino Crisis is a remarkable game that guarantees you an exciting experience, full of suspense and non-stop action. It does not disappoint in any way. Despite completing the game in just four days (with seven hours of playing time), it would be wise to rent it beforehand. While there are a few weak moments in the voice acting, it is not the worst you will come across. The captivating story and intense battles against the enemy dinosaurs will undoubtedly hold your interest. Another positive aspect is the inclusion of decision-making moments at crucial points in the storyline, as well as the opportunity to try out different costumes. However, even with these added features, the game falls short of providing the necessary replay value to earn a perfect 5-star rating.

Dino Crisis is an incredibly enjoyable game, delivering a thrilling blend of excitement, suspense, and action. It truly excels in these aspects. Despite completing the game in just four days, with a total of seven hours of gameplay, I recommend renting it first to get a taste of its brilliance. While there are some weak spots in the voice acting, it is far from the worst you will encounter. The engaging story and intense battles against the enemy dinosaurs will keep you thoroughly engrossed. Furthermore, the game offers the added bonus of decision-making opportunities at crucial junctures in the narrative, as well as the option to experiment with various costumes. Nevertheless, even with these admirable features, the game lacks the necessary replay value to earn a perfect 5-star rating.
